Name: Rocketeer
About the game: You - as a skillful space rocket pilot - have to survive in space. Use all your talent to pass through meteor fields or find your way out from a giant asteroid. None of the levels are impossible, everything depends on your talent! Keep an eye on your lights and once you passed a level, ask yourself: 'Can I be faster?' Use left and right arrows to turn your rocket, and give a boost with the up arrow. You can shoot projectiles with the spacebar, but you can destroy only the golden rocks and meteorites. Your score is based on your speed, your accidents, and destroyed meteorites.
